page.title: 11MEDIA-TELEVISION
page.content: These are the children's favourite televison programmes." HUNTER" is an American crime series about two detectives who solve crime. In "STREET HAWK" Jessie Mach travels on a highly sophisticated motor cycle. With the help of Norman Tuttle he solves crime. "KNIGHT RIDER" is about a car of the future that drives itself."THE YOUNG ONES"is about four students who go to college, they live in a small house.It is a comedy programme. "DALLAS"is an American soap opera about a wealthy oil family who live in Dallas .There are 4 main channels BBC1 BBC2 ITV and CHANNEL 4.Most people in class 1 Handcross C.P. School watch 4 hours of television a day.
